resources.string: Food Coupons Are For Participants Only!

This quiz will be live during the hackathon to determine the pitching order of the different teams. The questions will be in MCQ format with four options each. For each question, drag the question card to one of the 4 screen corners to make your choice.

Choice 1: Top Left Corner 
Choice 2: Top Right Corner
Choice 3: Bottom Left Corner
Choice 4: Bottom Right Corner

Right from its inception in 2009, the ACM VIT Student Chapter has been organising and conducting successful technical and professional development events. It hosted Compute 2013, the 6th ACM India Computing Convention from 22nd to 24th August, 2013, as well as the first All India ACM Chapters Meet on 24th August, 2013. It has credentials in web/mobile applications development and machine learning. The websites "All About VIT" and "VIT Cab Share" are some of the treasured creations of its core members. Technology is its cause and education is its objective.
The first mechanical computer designed by Charles Babbage was called?
